column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Tell me about your T-shirt , what 's on the front ?
#Text=The front is my image , and the back is ' Just Ask ' , with my website .
#Text=Could you stand up and show me ?
#Text=Sure .
#Text=On the front is my image , and on the back is the word ' Just Ask ' with my website [ zooming in , reggiebibbs.com ] .

#Text=I have a blog where we meet and talk with others that have NF , or just others that just want to know about it , they may have family members , just let them know what were doing with the Just Ask campaign , let them know what I 'm doing at the events , and we share stories , and photos , and everything like that .
#Text=How important is that blog to people with NF ?
#Text=That blog is very important to a lot of people , because it 's a way of connecting with others that have NF .
#Text=It 's a way of connecting with moms and dads that need support from other parents and from others that just can say words of encouragement .
#Text=Do you think there 's other people like you who do n't want to go out in the public , and this is their link to people ?
#Text=I really do , I really believe .
#Text=You know , I chat with a lot of others that have NF and that do n't go anywhere and this is the way we communicate .
#Text=We try to encourage others to do just that , to go out with a friend and let people see you and give them a chance to know who you are .
#Text=And let them see you having fun .
#Text=I guarantee you , if they see you smiling and enjoying yourself , that will encourage them .
#Text=Do you think by you going out and taking pictures and putting them on your blog , that you 've made other people wan na do that too ?
#Text=I really believe that and that 's what my goal is , to let others that have NF see me doing this .
#Text=I want to encourage them to do the same thing , they can do the same thing .
#Text=Give people a chance , smile at them , let them know that you 're happy and you 're not bitter .
#Text=I would encourage you to find a friend and go places , just go to as many places as you can think of , and let people see that you 're having fun .
#Text=Is there anything else you 're doing on your website that we should know about ?
#Text=Yes , right know I 'm selling T-shirts to help raise awareness and research for neurofibromatosis and to search for a cure .
#Text=How has it been going ?
#Text=It 's been going great , and I hope it continues to go great .
